QueryResult.text: select ii.id object_instance_id, a.user_id user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v0 a, inv_investments ii where a.object_id = 51780 and a.permission_code='READ' and a.object_instance_id = ii.id UNION select ii.id object_instance_id, a.user_id user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v a, inv_investments ii, inv_ideas ideas, srm_resources r where a.object_id = 50540 and a.permission_code='READ' and a.object_instance_id = r.id and r.user_id = ii.manager_id and ii.id = ideas.id UNION select ii.id object_instance_id, a.user_id user_id from cmn_sec_chk_user_v a, inv_investments ii, inv_ideas ideas, srm_resources r where a.object_id = 50540 and a.permission_code='READ' and a.object_instance_id = r.id and r.user_id = ideas.initiator_id and ii.id = ideas.id
